title: The Passionate Imposter
description: Serena Carmichael and Trent Shelden are best friends who cook up a plan to fake a love affair and an engagement to allow Trent to claim his inheritance. His brother, Nathaniel, is head of all family holdings and controls Trent's trust fund. Once the plan is in motion the sparks begin to fly between Nathaniel and Serena. How far will these three go to get what they want? Could it be that love has it's own agenda?
author: Angela Amos
